item.title: China’s Rare Earth Dominance Must End
item.description: Ending the West’s dependency on China in this area will be expensive, but it is a price that we will have to pay.

item.title: The Return of the Hostages Is a Triumph for Both President Trump and Israel
item.description: Trump refused to prevent Israel from winning.

item.title: Has a U.S. President Ever Been More Pro-Israel?
item.description: Isolationists and malicious enemies of Israel are part of Trump’s coalition, but the president absolutely does not number himself among them.

item.title: FDA’s Approval of Mifepristone Generic Raises Troubling Questions
item.description: For one: Why did the administration not put up a bigger fight on this issue?

item.title: A Hard-Fought Triumph in Israel
item.description: Today’s return of hostages is the direct result of Jerusalem’s commitment and Trump’s unwavering support in the face of immense pressure.
